questions.question: The rebels …………………….. after years of resistance.
questions.description: To give in is to surrender.

questions.question: She ………………………….. her difficulties by working hard.
questions.description: To get over difficulties is to overcome them.

questions.question: Although several dignitaries were expected to attend the function, only a few ………………………..
questions.description: To turn up is to make an appearance.

questions.question: The manager ………………………….. my request for a transfer.
questions.description: To turn down a request is to reject it.

questions.question: He is accustomed ……………………… living in such poor conditions.
questions.description: If you are accustomed to something you are used to it.

questions.question: While the terrorist was assembling a bomb, it ……………………….. and killed him.
questions.description: When a bomb goes off, it explodes.

questions.question: Are you ready to ………………………… the new responsibility?
questions.description: To take on a responsibility can mean accept it.

questions.question: Did you …………………………… that story or was it true?
questions.description: To make up a story is to invent it.

questions.question: The author has ………………………….. a new edition of his book.
questions.description: To bring out a book is to publish it.

questions.question: The new economic policy …………………………. a revival in the industrial sector.
questions.description: To bring about a revival is to cause a revival.
